WELCOME TO
Global Data
A 3D data visualization of international trade.
Built using Vanilla JavaScript, Three.js, and Geometry.
Instructions:
  • Use the country search bar to change countries
  • Use the product search bar to change products
  • Use the year range at the bottom to change the year
  • Thicker arcs indicate more trade
  • Blue arcs represent imports and red arcs represent exports
Press any key or click to begin
